dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Asbestos rope; Chrysotile cord; Amosite cord; Crocidolite rope; Fireproof cord; Heat-resistant asbestos cord
Asbestos rope; Chrysotile cord; Amosite cord; Crocidolite rope; Fireproof cord; Heat-resistant asbestos cord
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Asbestos cord refers to a product composed of asbestos fibers twisted or braided into a flexible cord. It is processed to various degrees of density and diameter for its desired application. The cord has typically undergone thermal treatment, aligning with various quality and safety standards. The primary usage of asbestos cord has been in high-temperature sealing applications and insulating purposes. Its production route involves the spinning or braiding of asbestos fibers, with asbestos being the main educt. This product is often considered part of an industrial consumption mix and is available 'at plant' for incorporation into other products or systems.
石棉绳是由石棉纤维缠绕或编织成的一种柔性绳索。它被加工成不同密度和直径以适应其预期用途。石棉绳通常经过热处理，符合各种质量和安全标准。石棉绳主要用于高温密封和绝缘。其生产路线包括纺织或编织石棉纤维，石棉是主要原料。这种产品通常被认为是工业消费混合物的一部分，在工厂现场可用于结合到其他产品或系统中。
